page.title: 11Ashbourne Man's Typical Day.
page.content: {Mr Average Ashbourne}is a man who is married,has 2 to 3 children and works. He gets up at{7.00 a.m.}For{breakfast He has a cup of tea.He arrives at work at{8.00 a.m. Tea break}is about {9.30 {a.m.}He has a sandwich and a cup of tea. The{work}he does can be anything from renovating old property to building extensions. {Dinner}time is at{12.30 p.m.}He has soup with bread,a yogurt and an apple. He normally finishes work at{5.00 p.m. and arrives home at{5.30 p.m.}For{tea he has meat and three veg.and a pudding. After tea he does some bookwork. For his{entertainment}he likes soap operas.He likes situation comedies and documentaries.He goes to{bed between{10.30}and{12.00 p.m.}In his {spare time}he likes swimming.
